data.value: WARNING: The \"devenv /updateconfiguration\" command may have failed to execute succesfully preventing Visual Studio 2017 from registering/unregistering MySQL for Visual Studio. If affected, run the command manually using \"Developer Command Prompt for VS\". For additional details, see the product documentation.
